price: dan kamu telah berbuat suatu perbuatan yang telah kamu lakukan itu 1080 dan kamu termasuk golongan orang-orang yang tidak membalas guna.
arabic: وَفَعَلۡتَ فَعۡلَتَكَ ٱلَّتِي فَعَلۡتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: 1080.  Maksudnya ialah perbuatan Nabi Musa ‘Alaihissalām membunuh orang Qibṭi.  Selanjutnya, lihat Surah (28) Al-Qaṣaṣ ayat 15.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wafaʿalta faʿlataka allatī faʿalta wa-anta mina al-kāfirīna
